msContents.summary: Gnostic fever amulet (both pagan and Christian); contains three quotations from the Scriptures, including the Lord's Prayer, in which there are numerous errors and omissions; Psalms xc.1-2; Matthew vi.9-11; Isaiah vi.3

msItem.note: Written across the fibers; back blank
The hand is a fluent cursive
The lines slope down to the right
